s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SHOULDER BELT ANCHOR ADJUSTER ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Insert the tip of the adjuster to the pillar, and align the adjuster's bolt hole to the pillar's bolt hole.
Install the bolt as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SHOULDER BELT ANCHORAGE PLATE COVER

s2.ptxt: Install the plate cover as shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Make sure the plate cover is firmly set into the garnish's claws.

s2.ptxt: Attach the claw and clip to install the garnish.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT OUTER BELT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Align the claws with the seat belt positioning holes and install the retractor of the outer belt with the bolt as shown in the illustration.
Install the 2 bolts and seat belt.
Connect the pretensioner connector as shown in the illustration.
Connect the outer belt with the shoulder anchor's bolt.
Attach the 4 claws to install the seat belt anchor cover cap.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL CENTER PILLAR GARNISH LOWER LH

s2.ptxt: Connect the anchor of the outer belt with the built-in bolt after installing the center pillar garnish lower.
Attach the 2 claws to install the lap belt outer anchor cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR DOOR OPENING TRIM WEATHERSTRIP LH

s2.ptxt: Align the paint mark on the rear door opening trim weatherstrip with the mark position on the vehicle and install the rear door opening trim weatherstrip as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR DOOR SCUFF PLATE LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clips and 7 claws to install the rear door scuff plate.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR OPENING TRIM WEATHERSTRIP LH

s2.ptxt: Align the paint mark on the front door opening trim with the mark position on the vehicle and install the front door opening trim as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR SCUFF PLATE LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clips and 7 claws to install the front door scuff plate.
Place the seat in the cabin.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the vehicle body.

s2.ptxt: Connect the connector under the seat.
Install the seat with the 4 bolts.

atten4.ptxt: Tighten the bolts in the order indicated in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

atten3.ptxt: When disconnecting the cable, some systems need to be initialized after the cable is reconnected (See page ).
